title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.31 - Property not permitted as prizes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4820.31 - Property not permitted as prizes

State Regulations

No licensee shall offer, distribute or give any prize
consisting of real estate or an interest therein, bonds, shares of stock, securities or evidence of indebtedness, or any merchandise refundable in any of
the foregoing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4820.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
